summary: This makes the Triss Light Armor provided by Fraper craftable and upgradeable.
descriptionHtml:
I received permission from Fraper to upload this. You MUST have his file installed for this to work correctly. My file does not include the textures and meshes, just a modified esp. 

Original Triss Armor from Fraper (required):  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5135

To Install:  Add Fraper\'s meshes and textures to your Data file. Add the esp included here. Or just his whole file and then this one. Make sure this esp overwrites Fraper\'s.

Armor is in the Leather section of Smithing. This is just for the Light Armor, not cloth. 


Fraper uploaded the original Triss Armor to Nexus. CDProjekt created the original armor for Witcher 2. 

Licensing/Legal:

All models in this pack are copyrighted, and belong to their original authors and copyright holders. This mod is not an commercial modification and so you cant gain any profits by releasing any parts of it for any material benefits.

The original Triss armor concept, mesh and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used with permission.
The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved.
http://www.cdprojekt.com/
author: danbuter
